summary: Provides a Litellm-compatible backend that enables interaction with large language models hosted on Amazon SageMaker, handling configuration, authentication, request construction, response decoding, and offering synchronous, asynchronous, and streaming generation as well as embedding retrieval.
business_intent: Allows developers to seamlessly integrate SageMaker-hosted LLM capabilities into applications through a unified Litellm interface, facilitating scalable text generation and embedding services without managing low‑level AWS request details.
